data.name: Jen
data.testamonial: Mr Kapur is an AMAZING teacher! I enjoy his classes and homework challenges

data.name: Micheal
data.testamonial: Juila really enjoyed the lessons. She has just finished her second year of university studying to be a software developer

data.name: Markus
data.testamonial: My daughter loved the lessons - helped her get into Cambridge university

data.name: Mrs Patel
data.testamonial: Niel loves his coding lessons with Mr Kapur - he wants to be a software engineer too.

data.name: Mr Watson
data.testamonial: Wanted to come back to tell you that Lukas just got accepted for an internship at Google.

data.name: Adam
data.testamonial: I cannot thank Annup enough for the help and support through my Computer Science GCSE.

data.name: Heather
data.testamonial: There were some confusing ALevel computing topics - he made them really easy to understand.

data.name: Emily
data.testamonial: Simply the best computing teacher I have ever had.

data.name: Satveer
data.testamonial: The learning is really great, Mr Kapur made computer science and coding fun.
